story.text: Bogota Jan 2 Colombia's public external debt rose to $25.14 billion in September compared with $23.45 billion in the same month the year before, the central bank said in a statement on Tuesday. The country's balance of payments deficit rose to $1.96 billion in September versus $1.58 billion in September of 2005, a separate statement from the bank said.
story.title: colombian external debt $ 25 . 14 bln in sept - cenbank
